text: Paige Summers (Nancy Ann Coursey; July 21, 1976 in Lorain, Ohio, United States - September 22, 2003) was an American adult model. She was a former Penthouse Pet of the Month and Pet of the Year. She moved with her family to Morganton, North Carolina and graduated from Freedom High School where her senior superlative was "Barbie Look-Alike". ==Career== She invented the name Paige Summers for her adult modeling career. She appeared in several issues of High Society and Cheri magazines in 1995, and was first chosen Penthouse Pet of the Month for August 1996, but her fame came as Penthouse Pet of the Year for 1998 where she became the first North Carolinian to be so chosen. Kia Motors gave her a Sportage SUV as part of her award, in exchange for advertising."Seventh- Inning Stretch" Brandweek, September 27, 1999, by Jeff Green. Archived at Findarticles.com. Retrieved 23 May 2007. She claimed to earn half a million dollars a year."The Mike Walker Game With Penthouse Pet Paige Summers", summary of Howard Stern show of August 21, 1998. Retrieved 23 May 2007. Summers appeared on The Howard Stern Show and several Penthouse videos.Penthouse - 1997 Pet of the Year Play-Off & 1998 Winners (1997) Penthouse: Girls Of The Zodiac (1999), Penthouse Behind The Scenes At The Swimsuit Calendar Photo (2000) Pet of the Year and Friends Starring Paige Summers. Retrieved 23 May 2007. ==Personal life== Coursey traveled as part of her career, visiting India and Australia. In 2003, she moved in with her family in Morganton. She was engaged to be married to local pharmacist and real estate owner Bracey Bobbitt on October 11, 2003. She was found dead in her home on the shore of Lake James, on the morning of September 22 of a drug overdose from a combination of the painkillers codeine and oxycodone. Coursey is buried at the Mountain Grove United Methodist Church Cemetery in Morganton. == See also == * List of Penthouse Pets of the Year ==References== ==External links== * Category:1976 births Category:2003 deaths Category:American female adult models Category:Penthouse Pets of the Year Category:People from Lorain, Ohio Category:Drug-related deaths in North Carolina Category:Penthouse Pets Category:Pornographic film actors from Ohio Category:Pornographic film actors from North Carolina Category:People from Morganton, North Carolina
title: Paige Summers
